name: Freedom of Association and Right to Collective Bargaining Policy

fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Affirms the right of employees to associate freely, join trade unions, and bargain collectively, aligned with WIETA/SIZA and South African law.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all employees, contractors, suppliers, and business partners.

fields.label: Employee Rights
options: Raise concerns without fear of retaliation

fields.label: Compliance and Due Diligence
options: Employment decisions unaffected by union activity
Training provided to management and employees

fields.label: Reporting Violations
fields.description: Use whistleblower channels; confidentiality protected; no retaliation for good-faith reporting.

fields.label: Consequences of Non-Compliance
fields.description: Disciplinary or legal action may be taken for policy violations.

fields.label: Review and Monitoring
fields.description: Policy reviewed periodically for continued effectiveness and compliance.
